nodes.text: Davim Cross was a Human male diplomat for both the Galactic Republic and the Galactic Empire. He was the father of Jahan and Jens Cross.

During the Clone Wars, he worked for the Republic Diplomatic Corps. In 3 BBY, he served as the main Imperial negotiator on the planet Serenno, representing Bail Prestor Organa in the dispute for who among the Great Houses of Serenno would serve as regent for Bron Dooku.
